FuncDef:
The bpdu bridge tagged-packet enable command enables an interface to transparently transmit tagged BPDUs.
The undo bpdu bridge tagged-packet enable command disables the transparent transmission of tagged BPDUs. The bpdu bridge tagged-packet enable command enables an interface to transparently transmit tagged BPDUs. The undo bpdu bridge tagged-packet enable command disables the transparent transmission of tagged BPDUs. By default, transparent transmission of tagged BPDUs is disabled. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
